title: Lady Bird Johnson
description:
Lady Bird Johnson was First Lady during a turbulent time in the US. While her methods and voice may not have been the loudest, she touched many lives, changed many hearts, and left a beautiful legacy.

itunes:title: Lady Bird Johnson
itunes:summary: More than "just" a First Lady, she was a businesswoman, a mom, a writer, and a champion of both conservation and civil rights.
